data.title: Small Cell Networks
data.text:
The AvenueÂ® product line provides best-in-class wireless backhaul for outdoor small cell deployments. Zoning-friendly, compact units mounted unobtrusively on street lamp poles, utility poles, billboards or the sides of buildings define the DragonWave-X Avenue products. They are perfect for delivering 3G and 4G service in the urban core and other high-density areas. Engineered for more efficient use of spectrum in small cells, the Avenue Link, and Link Lite can be situated to deliver interference-free service while meeting the size, weight and aesthetic requirements set by city zoning officials. Avenue provides a complete solution offering in licensed and unlicensed bands from 2-60 GHz providing LOS and NLOS connectivity.

Solution Highlights
